top_questions.text: Define e-commerce with its types. f) What is table? Which view is used to modify a table? g) What is Query? List any two importance of it. h) Define Validation rule and Validation text. i) Give any two differences between Form and Report.
Write a program in Q-Basic to create a sequential data file named "record.txt" and store Roll number, Name, Address and Class of few students.
Write down any two objects of MS-Access.

Write down the output of the given program and show them in dry run table: DECLARE SUB Result (A$) A$="Development" CALL Result (A$) END SUB Result (A$) FOR C=1 TO LEN(A$) STEP 2 X$=MID$(A$,C,1) PRINT X$ NEXT C END SUB
